question: Which Indian company, along with UK based BP is to start Oil production from the deepest offshore gas field in Asia?
explanation:
Reliance Industries Ltd (RIL) and British multinational oil and gas company BP announced the commencement of Oil production from R Cluster.
It is the ultra-deep-water gas field in block KG D6 off the east coast of India. It is said to be the deepest offshore gas field in Asia, as it is located at a water depth of over 2,000 m. Three deep water gas projects are to be developed by the two companies.
